favourite.article: To share with all sisters, for the 2016 this is to Christ Jesus, God's son back on earth, we all must be following God's word, in His Bible, to be God's people, to change the earth, there is no end of the recovery of God, for His returning, sisters? I'm saying of my own words but by God's word in me, to offer up His Recovery so when next year will be God's building, the New Jerusalem, let's keep the meeting to sail on with Him. My prayer:
